== Description ==

Display the post content for feeds.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php the_content_feed( $feed_type ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$feed_type|string|The type of feed. Can be atom, rss, rss2 or rdf.|optional|null}}
